Articles.Content: I have a launch window for Jool coming up, and I'm going to be launching several flights. Is there a processing limit to the number of flights en route to a planet. I'll have at least 2 large stations, a base expansion, and a return shuttle.
Nope. You can send as many things as you want

More vessels = more lag when vessels are displayed in map mode. Probably won't happen with 5 - 10 vessels.

270 vessels is a different story though (I got carried away when tracking asteroids... derp)

No other limits that I'm aware of, not counting the really ridiculous one - variable type limit (if anyone manages to have more vessels than the range of whatever var type is there, I demand pics).
Sent 5 separate missions to Duna at once, had them in LKO awaiting a window .... Nice variation with each departing one orbit after another...
